name: Crazy Stick Man Race - Endless run jump and avoid obstacles adventure
name_original: Crazy Stick Man Race - Endless run jump and avoid obstacles adventure
description:
Everyone needs to make a good concentration…
Unleash your inner craziness as you avoid the obstacles to score as many points as possible!!!

Help the Stick Man to jump from building to building...

[ How to play ]
- tap screen to jump
- tap again to double jump
- avoid colored buildings...

Download it now…
And Enjoy the game!!!
